messages.content: What does the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node detect?
The ComfyUI-KerasOCR node detects text in images and returns a covering mask.
How does the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node function?
It takes an image and an optional input mask, and it returns a detecting mask.
What are the input requirements for the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node?
The input requirements are an image and an optional input mask.
What does the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node output?
What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node?
The purpose of the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node is to detect text in images and return a covering mask.
Could the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node handle images with multi-language text?
Yes, the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node can handle images with multi-language text since it focuses on the general text detecting functionality.
Can the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node be tuned for improved text detection?
Yes, the ComfyUI-KerasOCR node can be tuned for improved text detection by adjusting its parameters accordingly.
